description: The addition operation represented by the symbol +

examples.affirmativePt: Dois mais dois é igual a quatro
examples.negativeEn: Two plus two doesn't equal four
examples.negativePt: Dois mais dois não é igual a quatro
examples.interrogativeEn: Does two plus two equal four?
examples.interrogativePt: Dois mais dois é igual a quatro?

description: The subtraction operation represented by the symbol -

examples.affirmativePt: Cinco menos três é igual a dois
examples.negativeEn: Five minus three doesn't equal two
examples.negativePt: Cinco menos três não é igual a dois
examples.interrogativeEn: Does five minus three equal two?
examples.interrogativePt: Cinco menos três é igual a dois?

description: The multiplication operation represented by the symbol *

examples.affirmativePt: Três vezes quatro é igual a doze
examples.negativeEn: Three times four doesn't equal twelve
examples.negativePt: Três vezes quatro não é igual a doze
examples.interrogativeEn: Does three times four equal twelve?
examples.interrogativePt: Três vezes quatro é igual a doze?

description: The division operation represented by the symbol /

examples.affirmativeEn: Eight divided by two equals four
examples.affirmativePt: Oito dividido por dois é igual a quatro
examples.negativeEn: Eight divided by two doesn't equal four
examples.negativePt: Oito dividido por dois não é igual a quatro
examples.interrogativeEn: Does eight divided by two equal four?
examples.interrogativePt: Oito dividido por dois é igual a quatro?

description: The operation that finds the number that when multiplied by itself gives the original number

examples.affirmativeEn: The square root of sixteen is four
examples.affirmativePt: A raiz quadrada de dezesseis é quatro
examples.negativeEn: The square root of sixteen is not four
examples.negativePt: A raiz quadrada de dezesseis não é quatro
examples.interrogativeEn: Is the square root of sixteen four?
examples.interrogativePt: A raiz quadrada de dezesseis é quatro?

description: The exponentiation operation where a number is multiplied by itself a certain number of times

examples.affirmativeEn: Two to the power of three equals eight
examples.affirmativePt: Dois à potência de três é igual a oito
examples.negativeEn: Two to the power of three doesn't equal eight
examples.negativePt: Dois à potência de três não é igual a oito
examples.interrogativeEn: Does two to the power of three equal eight?
examples.interrogativePt: Dois à potência de três é igual a oito?

description: The comparison operation that checks if one number is larger than another, represented by the symbol >

examples.negativeEn: Ten is not greater than five
examples.negativePt: Dez não é maior que cinco

description: The comparison operation that checks if one number is smaller than another, represented by the symbol <

examples.negativeEn: Three is not less than seven
examples.negativePt: Três não é menor que sete

description: The comparison operation that checks if two numbers are the same, represented by the symbol =

examples.affirmativeEn: Four plus four is equal to eight
examples.affirmativePt: Quatro mais quatro é igual a oito
examples.negativeEn: Four plus four is not equal to eight
examples.negativePt: Quatro mais quatro não é igual a oito
examples.interrogativeEn: Is four plus four equal to eight?
examples.interrogativePt: Quatro mais quatro é igual a oito?

description: The comparison operation that checks if two numbers are different, represented by the symbol ≠

examples.affirmativeEn: Five is not equal to three
examples.affirmativePt: Cinco não é igual a três
examples.interrogativeEn: Is five not equal to three?
examples.interrogativePt: Cinco não é igual a três?

description: The comparison operation that checks if one number is larger than or the same as another, represented by the symbol ≥

examples.affirmativeEn: Six is greater than or equal to six
examples.affirmativePt: Seis é maior ou igual a seis
examples.negativeEn: Six is not greater than or equal to six
examples.negativePt: Seis não é maior ou igual a seis
examples.interrogativeEn: Is six greater than or equal to six?
examples.interrogativePt: Seis é maior ou igual a seis?

description: The comparison operation that checks if one number is smaller than or the same as another, represented by the symbol ≤

examples.affirmativeEn: Two is less than or equal to two
examples.affirmativePt: Dois é menor ou igual a dois
examples.negativeEn: Two is not less than or equal to two
examples.negativePt: Dois não é menor ou igual a dois
examples.interrogativeEn: Is two less than or equal to two?
examples.interrogativePt: Dois é menor ou igual a dois?

description: A number expressed as a fraction of 100, represented by the symbol %

examples.affirmativeEn: Fifty percent of one hundred is fifty
examples.affirmativePt: Cinquenta por cento de cem é cinquenta
examples.negativeEn: Fifty percent of one hundred is not fifty
examples.negativePt: Cinquenta por cento de cem não é cinquenta
examples.interrogativeEn: Is fifty percent of one hundred fifty?
examples.interrogativePt: Cinquenta por cento de cem é cinquenta?

description: The product of all positive integers from 1 to a given number, represented by the symbol !

examples.affirmativeEn: The factorial of five is one hundred twenty
examples.affirmativePt: O fatorial de cinco é cento e vinte
examples.negativeEn: The factorial of five is not one hundred twenty
examples.negativePt: O fatorial de cinco não é cento e vinte
examples.interrogativeEn: Is the factorial of five one hundred twenty?
examples.interrogativePt: O fatorial de cinco é cento e vinte?

description: The remainder operation that returns the remainder after division, represented by the symbol %

examples.affirmativePt: Dez módulo três é igual a um
examples.negativeEn: Ten modulo three doesn't equal one
examples.negativePt: Dez módulo três não é igual a um
examples.interrogativeEn: Does ten modulo three equal one?
examples.interrogativePt: Dez módulo três é igual a um?
